DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_ID, a.CNTRCT_TYPE, a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR, a.CNTRCT_STTS_CD, a.LST_CHG_USR, a.LST_CHG_TMS, a.CREATD_USR_ID, a.CREATD_TM_STMP, a.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND, a.CNTRCT_HDQTR_ST_CD FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a WHERE a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?

SELECT DISTINCT a.cntrct_sys_id, a.cntrct_id, a.cntrct_test_prod_mfdf_ind, a.cntrct_vrsn_nbr, a.cntrct_stts_cd, decode(d.product_nm,NULL , 'N','Y') IMAGE_READY FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr a, cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn b, (SELECT cntrct_parnt_sys_id, MAX (cntrct_vrsn_nbr) cntrct_vrsn_nbr FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr WHERE cntrct_type IN ('CUSTOM', 'MODEL', 'STANDARD', 'SHELL') GROUP BY cntrct_parnt_sys_id) aa, cntrct_dt_sgmnt c, img_dat_adopt_prod d, prod_mstr e WHERE a.cntrct_sys_id = b.cntrct_sys_id AND a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id = aa.cntrct_parnt_sys_id AND a.cntrct_vrsn_nbr = aa.cntrct_vrsn_nbr AND a.cntrct_stts_cd = {0} AND a.cntrct_type IN ('CUSTOM', 'MODEL', 'STANDARD', 'SHELL') AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = c.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND c.prod_sys_id = e.prod_sys_id AND e.prod_nm = d.product_nm (+) ORDER BY a.cntrct_id

SELECT A.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, A.CNTRCT_ID, A.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND,A.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,A.CNTRCT_STTS_CD from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR A, (Select CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID,max(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR where CNTRCT_TYPE in ('MANDATE') group by CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID)AA where A.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = AA.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID and A.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR = AA.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR and A.CNTRCT_STTS_CD = {0} and A.CNTRCT_TYPE in ('MANDATE')
SELECT a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID ,b.PRMRY_CD FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a,ITEM b WHERE b.CD_DESC_TXT ={0}
SELECT CNTRCT_SYS_ID ,CNTRCT_ID FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR WHERE CNTRCT_ID ={0}

SELECT a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_ID, a.CNTRCT_TYPE, a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR, a.CNTRCT_STTS_CD, a.LST_CHG_USR, a.LST_CHG_TMS, a.CREATD_USR_ID, a.CREATD_TM_STMP,a.CNTRCT_HDQTR_ST_CD,a.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a WHERE a.CNTRCT_ID = {0} AND a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR IN( SELECT MAX(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR AA WHERE CNTRCT_ID = {1} and AA.CNTRCT_STTS_CD != 'MARKED_FOR_DELETION')
SELECT MAX(CNTRCT_SYS_ID),MAX(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR WHERE CNTRCT_ID = {0}

select distinct CNTRCT_SYS_ID,CNTRCT_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR A, (select b.CNTRCT_SYS_ID contractSysId FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN b WHERE a.PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID )B, ( select CNTRCT_ID contractId,MAX(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) M from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR where CNTRCT_STTS_CD in ('CHECKED_IN','SCHEDULED_FOR_APPROVAL','CHECKED_OUT','APPROVED','PUBLISHED','TEST_SUCCESSFUL','TEST_FAILED','REJECTED','BUILDING') GROUP BY CNTRCT_ID)C where A.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = B.contractSysId and A.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR = C.M and C.contractId = A.CNTRCT_ID and A.CNTRCT_ID!={1}

SELECT cntrct_sys_id, cntrct_id, cntrct_vrsn_nbr, cntrct_stts_cd FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr WHERE cntrct_id = {0} AND cntrct_vrsn_nbr = 1 AND cntrct_stts_cd = 'MARKED_FOR_DELETION' UNION SELECT cntrct_sys_id, cntrct_id, cntrct_vrsn_nbr, cntrct_stts_cd FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr WHERE cntrct_id = {1} AND cntrct_vrsn_nbr IN ( SELECT MAX (cntrct_vrsn_nbr) FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr a WHERE a.cntrct_id = {2} AND a.cntrct_stts_cd != 'MARKED_FOR_DELETION')

SELECT cmst_cntrct_mstr.cntrct_sys_id, cmst_cntrct_mstr.cntrct_stts_cd FROM cntrct_dt_sgmnt, cmst_cntrct_mstr WHERE cmst_cntrct_mstr.cntrct_sys_id = cntrct_dt_sgmnt.cntrct_sys_id AND cntrct_dt_sgmnt.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = (SELECT cntrct_bsdt_sgmnt_sys_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr WHERE mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = (SELECT MAX (a.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id) FROM mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr a, mgrtd_cntrct_mstr b WHERE a.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = b.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id AND b.mgrtd_cntrct_id = {0}))

SelectSQLQuery.name: getBaseContracts
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select A.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, A.CNTRCT_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR A, (select CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID, MAX(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR X WHERE ((X.CNTRCT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' AND X.CNTRCT_TYPE ='STANDARD') OR (X.CNTRCT_STTS_CD = 'TEST_SUCCESSFUL' AND X.CNTRCT_TYPE = 'MODEL' )) GROUP BY CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID) AA where 1=1 AND A.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = AA.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID AND A.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR = AA.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR AND ((A.CNTRCT_STTS_CD = 'PUBLISHED' AND A.CNTRCT_TYPE ='STANDARD') OR (A.CNTRCT_STTS_CD = 'TEST_SUCCESSFUL' AND A.CNTRCT_TYPE = 'MODEL' ))
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC: and A.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' and c.LOB_NM {0} GROUP BY a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.LOB_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {0} AND CTLG_ID = 1925)) union (select unique a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' and c.LOB_NM LIKE 'ALL') )

and A.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' and c.BUS_ENTY_NM {1} GROUP BY a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.BUS_ENTY_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {1} AND CTLG_ID = 1932)) union (select unique a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' and c.BUS_ENTY_NM LIKE 'ALL') )

and A.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID in ( (select unique a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' and c.BUS_GRP_NM {2} GROUP BY a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID HAVING count(UNIQUE c.BUS_GRP_NM) = (select count(PRMRY_CD) from item where PRMRY_CD {2} AND CTLG_ID = 1933)) union (select unique CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and b.DOMN_SYS_ID = c.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'contract' and c.BUS_GRP_NM LIKE 'ALL') )
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: order by CNTRCT_ID asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: getBaseContractsForMigration
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT a.cntrct_sys_id, a.cntrct_id FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr a, cntrct_dt_sgmnt b, prod_mstr c, cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn d, (SELECT cntrct_parnt_sys_id, MAX (cntrct_vrsn_nbr) cntrct_vrsn_nbr FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr x WHERE (X.cntrct_stts_cd = 'TEST_SUCCESSFUL' and X.cntrct_type = 'MODEL') GROUP BY cntrct_parnt_sys_id) aa WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id = aa.cntrct_parnt_sys_id AND a.cntrct_vrsn_nbr = aa.cntrct_vrsn_nbr AND (a.cntrct_stts_cd = 'TEST_SUCCESSFUL' and cntrct_type = 'MODEL')
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC: AND a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id IN ( (SELECT UNIQUE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c WHERE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id AND b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' AND c.lob_nm {0} GROUP BY a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id HAVING COUNT (UNIQUE c.lob_nm) = (SELECT COUNT (prmry_cd) FROM item WHERE prmry_cd {0} AND ctlg_id = 1925)) UNION (SELECT UNIQUE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c WHERE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id AND b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' AND c.lob_nm LIKE 'ALL'))

AND a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id IN ( (SELECT UNIQUE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c WHERE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id AND b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' AND c.bus_enty_nm {1} GROUP BY a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id HAVING COUNT (UNIQUE c.bus_enty_nm) = (SELECT COUNT (prmry_cd) FROM item WHERE prmry_cd {1} AND ctlg_id = 1932)) UNION (SELECT UNIQUE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c WHERE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id AND b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' AND c.bus_enty_nm LIKE 'ALL'))

AND a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id IN ( (SELECT UNIQUE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c WHERE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id AND b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' AND c.bus_grp_nm {2} GROUP BY a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id HAVING COUNT (UNIQUE c.bus_grp_nm) = (SELECT COUNT (prmry_cd) FROM item WHERE prmry_cd {2} AND ctlg_id = 1933)) UNION (SELECT UNIQUE cntrct_parnt_sys_id FROM cmst_cntrct_mstr a, enty_domn_info b, avlbl_domn c WHERE a.cntrct_parnt_sys_id = b.enty_sys_id AND b.domn_sys_id = c.domn_sys_id AND b.enty_type = 'contract' AND c.bus_grp_nm LIKE 'ALL'))
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: AND d.cntrct_sys_id = a.cntrct_sys_id AND d.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND c.prod_sys_id = b.prod_sys_id AND c.prod_stts_cd = 'PUBLISHED' AND c.prod_type = 'STANDARD'
SelectSQLQuery.DYNAMIC: AND c.prod_efctv_dt <= TO_DATE ({3}, 'mm/dd/yyyy') AND c.prod_expiry_dt >= TO_DATE ({4}, 'mm/dd/yyyy')
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: order by CNTRCT_ID asc

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: CALL CONTRACT_COPY({0},{1},{2},{3},{4})

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR ( CNTRCT_SYS_ID, CNTRCT_ID, CNTRCT_TYPE, CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID, CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR, CNTRCT_STTS_CD, LST_CHG_USR, LST_CHG_TMS, CREATD_USR_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP,CNTRCT_HDQTR_ST_CD) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?)
UPDATE CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR SET CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR = ?, CNTRCT_STTS_CD = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ?,LST_CHG_TMS = ? ,CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND = ? WHERE CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?
DELETE FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR WHERE CNTRCT_SYS_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT d.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, d.cvrg_cd, d.prcg_cd, d.ntwk_cd, -- d.lst_chg_usr, d.lst_chg_tms, d.creatd_tm_stmp, d.creatd_usr_id, a.cd_desc_txt, b.cd_desc_txt, c.cd_desc_txt FROM cntrct_prcg_info d, item a, item b, item c WHERE d.dt_sgmnt_sys_id= {0} AND a.prmry_cd = d.cvrg_cd AND a.ctlg_id = 1695 AND b.prmry_cd = d.prcg_cd AND b.ctlg_id = 1696 AND c.prmry_cd = d.ntwk_cd AND c.ctlg_id = 1749 ORDER BY d.cvrg_cd, d.prcg_cd, d.ntwk_cd

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO cntrct_prcg_info (dt_sgmnt_sys_id, cvrg_cd, prcg_cd, ntwk_cd, lst_chg_usr, lst_chg_tms, creatd_usr_id, creatd_tm_stmp) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
DELETE FROM cntrct_prcg_info WHERE dt_sgmnt_sys_id = ? and cvrg_cd = ? and prcg_cd = ? and ntwk_cd = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery:
SELECT rlDt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,rlDt.RULE_ID, rlDt.EXCLSN_IND , rlDt.CLM_TYPE , rlDt.PLC_OF_SRVC, rlDt.PAT_LOW_AGE , rlDt.PAT_HIGH_AGE , rlDt.GNDR_CD, rlDt.PRVDR_ID , rlDt.PRVDR_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_NM , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_AMT , rlDt.BNFT_ACCUM_LMT_NBR , rlDt.NTFY_ONLY_IND, rlDt.CLNL_RVW_IND, rlDt.DLR_LMT , rlDt.SERIVCE_CD , rlDt.GRP_ST , rlDt.LEN_OF_STAY , rlDt.ITS_SPCLTY_CD , rlDt.SRVC_STRT_DT , rlDt.SRVC_END_DT , rlDt.MBR_RELSHP_CDE , rlDt.PRCDR_MODFR_CDE, rlDt.EDIT_CDE_1 , rlDt.EDIT_CDE_2 , rlDt.PRVDR_ST_CD , rlDt.BILL_TYP_CD , rlDt.TT_CD , rlDt.ATCHMT_IND, rlDt.PAT_MBR_CD , rlDt.HOSP_FCIL_CD , rlDt.DAYS_FROM_INJRY, rlDt.DAYS_FROM_ILNS , rlDt.HMO_CLS_CD , rlDt.TOT_CHRG_SIGN , rlDt.TOT_CHARGE_AMOUNT,rlDt.WPD_DEL_FLAG, rlDt.CPAY_IND , rlDt.HNDRD_PCT_IND, rlDt.MEDCR_ASGN_IND ,
rlDt.PROC_MDFR_CD2 , rlDt.SPRT_HCPS_IND , rlDt.DIAG_IND,rlDt.PCP_IND , rule.RULE_TYP_CD, rule.TAG, rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR, rcs.LINE_HCPT_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_HCPT_HIGH_VAL, rcs.LINE_DIAG_LOW_VAL, rcs.LINE_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_REV_LOW_VAL , rcs.LINE_REV_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rcs.LINE_ICDP_HIGH_VAL , rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_HIGH , rcs.LINE_SRVC_CLS_LOW , rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rcs.LINE_LMT_CLS_LOW , rcs.LINE_ICDP_VRSN_IND , rcs.LINE_DIAG_VRSN_IND,
rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR , rcls.CLM_SRVC_CD , rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD1, rcls.CLM_PROC_MDFR_CD2 , rcls.CLM_TT_CD , rcls.CLM_POS_CD , rcls.CLM_HMO_CLS_CD , rcls.CLM_SAME_DAY_SVC_IND , rcls.CLM_SPRTG_PROC_CD_IND,rcls.CLM_DIAG_IND,
rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR , rccs.CLM_HCPT_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_HCPT_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_DIAG_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_REV_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_REV_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_LOW_VAL , rccs.CLM_ICDP_HIGH_VAL , rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_HIGH , rccs.CLM_SRVC_CLS_LOW , rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_HIGH , rccs.CLM_LMT_CLS_LOW , rccs.CLM_ICDP_VRSN_IND , rccs.CLM_DIAG_VRSN_IND, rule.RULE_VRSN_NBR, rule.RULE_SHRT_DESC,dbms_random.random,
rlDt.DRG_CD, rlDt.PROV_SPEC_CD_IND, rcs.LINE_ICDP_CTGRY_CD, rcs.LINE_ICDP_CLSFCTN_ID, rcs.LINE_DIAG_CTGRY_CD, rcs.LINE_DIAG_CLSFCTN_ID, rccs.CLM_ICDP_CTGRY_CD, rccs.CLM_ICDP_CLSFCTN_ID, rccs.CLM_DIAG_CTGRY_CD, rccs.CLM_DIAG_CLSFCTN_ID, rlDt.PVDR_LIC_ID, rlDt.PVDR_MDCR_ID, rlDt.BLNG_PVDR_NR, rlDt.RNDR_PVDR_NR, rlDt.BLNG_NPI, rlDt.RNDR_NPI, rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_SIGN_CD, rlDt.ELGBL_EXPNS_AMT, rlDt.AGE_TYPE_CD
FROM Rule rule JOIN rule_dat rldt ON rldt.rule_id = rule.rule_id AND rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR = (SELECT MAX(RULE_VRSN_NBR )FROM Rule where rule_id={0} ) AND rldt.rule_id={0} LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_cd_sqnc rcs ON rcs.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcs.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcs.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_sqnc rcls ON rcls.rule_id = rldt.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rldt.rule_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rcls.RULE_VRSN_NBR LEFT OUTER JOIN rule_clm_cd_sqnc rccs ON rcls.rule_id =rccs.rule_id AND rcls.rule_sqnc_nbr = rccs.rule_sqnc_nbr AND rccs.clm_sqnc_nbr = rcls.clm_sqnc_nbr and rldt.RULE_VRSN_NBR=rccs.RULE_VRSN_NBR ORDER BY rldt.RULE_SQNC_NBR,rcs.CD_SQNC_NBR,rcls.CLM_SQNC_NBR,rccs.CLM_CD_SQNC_NBR DESC

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT PROD_RULE_SYS_ID, RULE_OVRD_VAL, LST_CHG_TMS, LST_CHG_USR, CREATD_TM_STMP, CREATD_USER_ID, DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN WHERE PROD_RULE_SYS_ID = ?

SELECT C.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID,R.WPD_DEL_FLAG FROM CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN C, PROD_RULE_ASSN P,RULE R where C.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID = P.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID AND P.RULE_ID = R.RULE_ID AND C.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND R.WPD_DEL_FLAG = 'Y'

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN ( PROD_RULE_SYS_ID, RULE_OVRD_VAL, LST_CHG_TMS, LST_CHG_USR, CREATD_TM_STMP, CREATD_USER_ID, DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
DELETE FROM CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN WHERE PROD_RULE_SYS_ID = ? AND DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ?
UPDATE CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN SET RULE_OVRD_VAL = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = ? WHERE PROD_RULE_SYS_ID = ? AND DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT PROD_RULE_SYS_ID, PROD_SYS_ID, RULE_ID, RULE_PVA, GNRTD_RULE_ID, WPD_DEL_FLG, RULE_OVRD_VAL, LST_CHG_TMS, LST_CHG_USR, CREATD_TM_STMP, CREATD_USER_ID FROM PROD_RULE_ASSN WHERE PROD_SYS_ID = ?

SELECT A.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID, A.PROD_SYS_ID,A.RULE_ID, A.RULE_PVA, A.GNRTD_RULE_ID, A.WPD_DEL_FLG, A.RULE_OVRD_VAL,B.RULE_SHRT_DESC FROM PROD_RULE_ASSN A,RULE B WHERE PROD_SYS_ID = {0} AND B.RULE_ID = A.RULE_ID AND A.GNRTD_RULE_ID LIKE ({2}) AND A.GNRTD_RULE_ID NOT IN (SELECT GNRTD_RULE_ID FROM PROD_RULE_ASSN WHERE PROD_RULE_SYS_ID IN( SELECT PROD_RULE_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {1} )) ORDER BY A.GNRTD_RULE_ID asc,B.RULE_SHRT_DESC asc

SELECT DISTINCT B.RULE_ID, B.GNRTD_RULE_ID,C.RULE_SHRT_DESC ,D.RULE_TYP_DESC,B.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID,B.PROD_SYS_ID,A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,A.RULE_OVRD_VAL,D.RULE_TYP_CD ,B.RULE_PVA,C.RULE_GRP_IND FROM CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN A,PROD_RULE_ASSN B,RULE C ,RULE_TYPE D WHERE A.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID= B.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID AND C.RULE_ID = B.RULE_ID AND C.RULE_TYP_CD = D.RULE_TYP_CD AND A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND B.GNRTD_RULE_ID LIKE ({1}) ORDER BY RULE_ID

-- select PROD_RULE_SYS_ID,DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID from CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN where RULE_OVRD_VAL is null -- and DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and PROD_RULE_SYS_ID in ( select PROD_RULE_SYS_ID from PROD_RULE_ASSN -- where GNRTD_RULE_ID LIKE ( '#%' ) -- OR GNRTD_RULE_ID LIKE ( '$%' ) -- OR GNRTD_RULE_ID LIKE ( '*%' )) select A.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID, A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, B.GNRTD_RULE_ID, B.RULE_ID, C.RULE_SHRT_DESC, B.RULE_PVA, CASE SUBSTR (B.GNRTD_RULE_ID, 1, 1) WHEN '#' THEN 'UM Rule' WHEN '&' THEN 'Exclusion Rule' WHEN '*' THEN 'Denial Rule' WHEN '$' THEN 'PNR Rule' ELSE D.rule_typ_desc END AS rule_typ_desc, TO_CHAR(E.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), TO_CHAR(E.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT, 'MM/DD/YYYY') from CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN A, PROD_RULE_ASSN B, RULE C, RULE_TYPE D, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT E where A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} and A.RULE_OVRD_VAL is null and A.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID = B.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID and ( B.GNRTD_RULE_ID LIKE ('#%') OR B.GNRTD_RULE_ID LIKE ('$%') OR B.GNRTD_RULE_ID LIKE ('*%') ) and B.RULE_ID = C.RULE_ID and C.RULE_TYP_CD = D.RULE_TYP_CD and A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = E.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID order by SUBSTR (b.gnrtd_rule_id, 1, 1),b.rule_id

SELECT C.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID, P.GNRTD_RULE_ID, P.RULE_ID, R.RULE_SHRT_DESC, P.RULE_PVA, CASE SUBSTR (P.GNRTD_RULE_ID, 1, 1) WHEN '#' THEN 'UM Rule' WHEN '&' THEN 'Exclusion Rule' WHEN '*' THEN 'Denial Rule' WHEN '$' THEN 'PNR Rule' ELSE T.rule_typ_desc END AS rule_typ_desc, TO_CHAR(E.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT, 'MM/DD/YYYY'), TO_CHAR(E.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT, 'MM/DD/YYYY') FROM CNTRCT_RULE_ASSN C, PROD_RULE_ASSN P, RULE R, rule_type T, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT E where C.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID = P.PROD_RULE_SYS_ID AND P.RULE_ID = R.RULE_ID AND C.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND R.WPD_DEL_FLAG = 'Y' AND R.RULE_TYP_CD = T.RULE_TYP_CD and C.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = E.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID order by SUBSTR (p.gnrtd_rule_id, 1, 1),p.rule_id

SELECT pra.prod_rule_sys_id, ds.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, ds.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_expry_dt, pra.gnrtd_rule_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_rule_assn mra, prod_rule_assn pra, mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr ds WHERE pra.prod_rule_sys_id = mra.prod_rule_sys_id AND ds.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = mra.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND (pra.gnrtd_rule_id LIKE ('#%') OR pra.gnrtd_rule_id LIKE ('$%') OR pra.gnrtd_rule_id LIKE ('*%')) AND (mra.rule_ovrd_val IS NULL OR mra.rule_ovrd_val IN (' ', ' ', ' ') ) AND mra.wpd_del_flg = 'N' AND mra.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id IN ( SELECT b.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_mstr a, mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr b WHERE a.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id = b.mgrtd_cntrct_sys_id AND a.mgrtd_cntrct_id = {0})

SELECT pra.prod_rule_sys_id, ds.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id, ds.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_expry_dt, pra.gnrtd_rule_id FROM mgrtd_cntrct_rule_assn mra, prod_rule_assn pra, mgrtd_cntrct_dt_sgmnt_mstr ds WHERE pra.prod_rule_sys_id = mra.prod_rule_sys_id AND ds.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = mra.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND (pra.gnrtd_rule_id LIKE ('#%') OR pra.gnrtd_rule_id LIKE ('$%') OR pra.gnrtd_rule_id LIKE ('*%')) AND (mra.rule_ovrd_val IS NULL OR mra.rule_ovrd_val IN (' ', ' ', ' ') ) AND mra.wpd_del_flg = 'N' AND mra.mgrtd_dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0}

select A.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id,A.cntrct_id, A.cntrct_stts_cd, A.lst_chg_usr, A.lst_chg_tms, A.creatd_tm_stmp, A.creatd_usr_id from rsrvd_cntrct_pool A,
(select count(A.DOMN_SYS_ID) numOfDomains,B.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id reserveCntrctId from ENTY_DOMN_INFO A,rsrvd_cntrct_pool B,(
select distinct(A.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id) reservedId from rsrvd_cntrct_pool A,(select a.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id reserveId,b.DOMN_SYS_ID domainID from rsrvd_cntrct_pool a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and c.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'reservecontract')AA where A.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id = AA.reserveId and AA.domainID {0} )AA where B.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id = AA.reservedId and A.ENTY_SYS_ID = AA.reservedId and A.ENTY_TYPE = 'reservecontract' group by B.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id)B where A.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id = B.reserveCntrctId and B.numOfDomains = {1} and cntrct_stts_cd = 'Y' and A.EFCTV_DT <= SYSDATE and A.EXPR_DT >= SYSDATE order by A.cntrct_id

SelectSQLQuery.name: locateContract
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select * from (select TWO.CNTRCT_SYS_ID,TWO.CNTRCT_ID contractName,TWO.CNTRCT_TYPE,TWO.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,TWO.CNTRCT_STTS_CD,TWO.COUNT,TWO.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,TWO.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT, TWO.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,TWO.PROD_SYS_ID, two.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND,two.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND,TWO.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID,TWO.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD,TWO.DT_SGMNT_VRSN_NBR from ( select CNTRCT_ID, max(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) VRSN FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR where CNTRCT_ID in (

select distinct a.CNTRCT_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT b,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN d,
(select b.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, max(a.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT) DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT from CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN b where 1=1 AND a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID
group by b.CNTRCT_SYS_ID) c where

select a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID,a.CNTRCT_ID,a.CNTRCT_TYPE,a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,a.CNTRCT_STTS_CD,(SELECT count(CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT WHERE a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.CNTRCT_SYS_ID AND CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND='N') COUNT, b.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,b.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT,b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,b.PROD_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND,b.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND,a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID,b.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD,b.DT_SGMNT_VRSN_NBR from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT b,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN d,
(select b.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, max(DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT) DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT from CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN b where 1=1 AND a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND a.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND = 'N'
group by b.CNTRCT_SYS_ID) c where
) TWO WHERE ONE.CNTRCT_ID = TWO.CNTRCT_ID AND ONE.VRSN = TWO.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR AND TWO.CNTRCT_TYPE !='SHELL'

UNION ( select TWO.CNTRCT_SYS_ID,TWO.CNTRCT_ID contractName,TWO.CNTRCT_TYPE,TWO.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,TWO.CNTRCT_STTS_CD,TWO.COUNT,TWO.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,TWO.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT, TWO.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,TWO.PROD_SYS_ID, two.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND,two.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND,TWO.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID,TWO.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD,TWO.DT_SGMNT_VRSN_NBR from ( select CNTRCT_ID, max(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) VRSN FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR where CNTRCT_ID in( select distinct a.CNTRCT_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT b,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN d where
))ContractTable where rownum <=51 order by ContractTable.contractName asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: locateContractUndomained
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: select * from (select TWO.CNTRCT_SYS_ID,TWO.CNTRCT_ID contractName,TWO.CNTRCT_TYPE,TWO.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,TWO.CNTRCT_STTS_CD,TWO.COUNT,TWO.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,TWO.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT, TWO.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,TWO.PROD_SYS_ID, two.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND,two.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND,TWO.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID,TWO.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD,TWO.DT_SGMNT_VRSN_NBR from ( select CNTRCT_ID, max(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) VRSN FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR where CNTRCT_ID in (

select distinct a.CNTRCT_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT b,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN d,
(select b.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, max(a.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT) DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT from CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN b where 1=1 AND a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID
group by b.CNTRCT_SYS_ID) c where

select a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID,a.CNTRCT_ID,a.CNTRCT_TYPE,a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,a.CNTRCT_STTS_CD,(SELECT count(CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT WHERE a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.CNTRCT_SYS_ID AND CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND='N') COUNT, b.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,b.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT,b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,b.PROD_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND,b.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND,a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID,b.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD,b.DT_SGMNT_VRSN_NBR from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT b,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN d,
(select b.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, max(a.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT) DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT from CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN b where 1=1 AND a.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND = 'N'
group by b.CNTRCT_SYS_ID) c where
) TWO WHERE ONE.CNTRCT_ID = TWO.CNTRCT_ID AND ONE.VRSN = TWO.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR AND TWO.CNTRCT_TYPE !='SHELL'

UNION ( select TWO.CNTRCT_SYS_ID,TWO.CNTRCT_ID contractName,TWO.CNTRCT_TYPE,TWO.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,TWO.CNTRCT_STTS_CD,TWO.COUNT,TWO.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,TWO.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT, TWO.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,TWO.PROD_SYS_ID, two.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND,two.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND,TWO.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID,TWO.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD,TWO.DT_SGMNT_VRSN_NBR from ( select CNTRCT_ID, max(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) VRSN FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR where CNTRCT_ID in( select distinct a.CNTRCT_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT b,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN d where

d.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID and b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID
) GROUP BY CNTRCT_ID ORDER BY CNTRCT_ID ASC ) ONE, ( select a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID,a.CNTRCT_ID,a.CNTRCT_TYPE,a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,a.CNTRCT_STTS_CD,(SELECT count(CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT WHERE a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.CNTRCT_SYS_ID AND CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND='N') COUNT, b.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,b.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT,b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,b.PROD_SYS_ID, a.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND,b.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND,a.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID,b.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD,b.DT_SGMNT_VRSN_NBR from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT b,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN d where

d.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID and b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ORDER BY a.CNTRCT_ID ASC ) TWO WHERE ONE.CNTRCT_ID = TWO.CNTRCT_ID AND ONE.VRSN = TWO.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR AND TWO.CNTRCT_TYPE ='SHELL'
))ContractTable where rownum <=51 order by ContractTable.contractName asc

SelectSQLQuery.name: locateContractBasedOnContractId
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT /*+ opt_param('_optimizer_use_feedback','false') */* FROM (SELECT CNTRCTDET.* FROM (SELECT CNTRCT_ID CNTRCT_ID, MAX(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) MAX_VRSN FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR WHERE CNTRCT_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT CMST.CNTRCT_ID FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR CMST ) GROUP BY CNTRCT_ID ) VRSNDET, (SELECT DISTINCT CM.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, CM.CNTRCT_ID, CM.CNTRCT_TYPE, CM.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR, CM.CNTRCT_STTS_CD, (SELECT COUNT(CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT WHERE CM.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.CNTRCT_SYS_ID AND CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ) COUNT, CDS.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT, CDS.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT, CDS.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, CDS.PROD_SYS_ID, CM.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND, CDS.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND, CM.CNTRCT_PARNT_SYS_ID, CDS.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD, CDS.DT_SGMNT_VRSN_NBR FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR CM, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN CDSA, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT CDS, (SELECT DSA.CNTRCT_SYS_ID, MAX(DS.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT) DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT DS, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN DSA WHERE DS.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = DSA.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID GROUP BY DSA.CNTRCT_SYS_ID ) DTSEGDET WHERE CM.CNTRCT_ID LIKE ({0}) ESCAPE '`' AND CM.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = CDSA.CNTRCT_SYS_ID AND CM.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = DTSEGDET.CNTRCT_SYS_ID AND CDS.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT = DTSEGDET.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT AND CDSA.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = CDS.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ) CNTRCTDET WHERE VRSNDET.CNTRCT_ID = CNTRCTDET.CNTRCT_ID AND VRSNDET.MAX_VRSN = CNTRCTDET.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR ORDER BY CNTRCTDET.CNTRCT_ID ASC
) ContractTable WHERE rownum <=51

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select distinct a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID,a.CNTRCT_ID,a.CNTRCT_TYPE,a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,a.CNTRCT_STTS_CD,b.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,b.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT,b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,b.PROD_SYS_ID,a.CNTRCT_TEST_PROD_MFDF_IND,b.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND,b.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD,b.DT_SGMNT_VRSN_NBR from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT b ,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN c where b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = c.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and c.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID and a.CNTRCT_ID = {0} ORDER BY a.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR desc ,b.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT asc

SELECT A.CNTRCT_ID,B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,A.CNTRCT_SYS_ID,B.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,B.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT,A.CNTRCT_STTS_CD,A.CNTRCT_TYPE,A.CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR,B.DT_SGMNT_TEST_PROD_IND,B.PROD_SYS_ID,b.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD,b.DT_SGMNT_VRSN_NBR FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR A,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN C WHERE C.CNTRCT_SYS_ID={0} AND A.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = C.CNTRCT_SYS_ID and B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =C.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ORDER BY B.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT ASC

A.DT_SGMNT_CRPRT_PLAN_CD) CRPRT_PLAN_CD_DESC, A.DT_SGMNT_BRND_NM, A.DT_SGMNT_PROD_CD, A.DT_SGMNT_PROD_CD_DESC PROD_CD_DESC, A.DT_SGMNT_STNDRD_PLAN_CD,(select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1701 SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: update DAT_FEED_STAT set FEED_RUN_FLG= ?,ETL_SCESS_FLG= ?,LST_CHNGD_USR_ID= ?, LST_CHNGD_TMS= SYSDATE where FEED_TYP= ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select CNTRCT_ID,CNTRCT_EFCTV_DT from MEMBERSHIP_INFO where CNTRCT_ID ={0}

select a.CNTRCT_ID,a.CNTRCT_EFCTV_DT,a.CASE_NBR,a.CASE_NAME,a.GROUP_NBR,a.GROUP_NAME,a.CASE_CANCEL_DT,a.GROUP_CANCEL_DT,a.CASE_EFCTV_DT,a.GROUP_EFCTV_DT,a.CASE_HQ_ST, a.FUND_ARRANGE_CODE , (select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1941 and PRMRY_CD = a.FUND_ARRANGE_CODE) FUND_ARRANGE_VAL, a.MBU_CODE,(select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1948 and PRMRY_CD = a.MBU_CODE) MBU_VAL, a.RERATE_CODE,(select CD_DESC_TXT from item where CTLG_ID = 1949 and PRMRY_CD = a.RERATE_CODE)RERATE_VAL,dbms_random.random from MEMBERSHIP_INFO a where a.CNTRCT_ID ={0}

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO CNTRCT_HIST(DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,CONTRCT_CODE,DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT, CPY_DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,CPY_CONTRCT_CODE, CPY_DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT,LST_CHG_USR,LST_CHG_TMS,CREATD_TM_STMP,CREATD_USER_ID) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN SET BNFT_HIDE_FLAG =?, BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG=?, LST_CHG_TMS = ?, LST_CHG_USR= ? WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ?
UPDATE CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD SET BNFT_HIDE_FLAG =?, BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG=?, LST_CHG_TMS = ?, LST_CHG_USR= ? WHERE PROD_SYS_ID =? AND DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = ? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ?

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT B.PROD_SYS_ID,A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A INNER JOIN CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B ON (a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id)

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN SET BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ? WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =? AND BNFT_SYS_ID =?
UPDATE CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD SET BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ? WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =? AND BNFT_SYS_ID =?
UPDATE CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD SET BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ? WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID =? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =? AND BNFT_SYS_ID =?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT LINES.lineId, LINES.primaryCode , LINES.benCompId , LINES.bnftId , LINES.bnftVal , LINES.lvlDesc , LINES.dataTypeLgnd, LINES.refDesc , LINES.prodId , LINES.linePva , LINES.benefitName , LINES.frequencyQualifier FROM (SELECT H.PRMRY_CD primaryCode , E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID benCompId , E.BNFT_SYS_ID bnftId , E.BNFT_LINE_CODED_VAL bnftVal , E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC lvlDesc , T.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND dataTypeLgnd, H.CD_DESC_TXT refDesc , C.BNFT_LVL_SQNC seqNum , D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID lineId , M.PROD_SYS_ID prodId , D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA linePva , K.BNFT_ID_NM benefitName , E.BLVL_BNFT_QLFR_FRQNCY frequencyQualifier FROM BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN A, BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR B , BLVL_BNFT_LVL C , CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES E , DTYP_DATA_TYPE T , ITEM G , ITEM H , ITEM I , BLN_BNFT_LINE D , BMST_BNFT_MSTR K , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN L , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT M WHERE E.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = l.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND e.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = l.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND e.bnft_sys_id = L.bnft_sys_id AND B.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID AND E.BNFT_SYS_ID = K.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND D.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = T.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID AND E.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND E.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = M.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR = G.PRMRY_CD(+) AND G.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935 -- QUALIFIER AND D.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = H.PRMRY_CD(+) AND H.CTLG_ID(+) = 1938 -- REFERENCE AND D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = I.PRMRY_CD AND I.CTLG_ID = 1936 -- PROVIDER ARRANGEMENT AND E.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND L.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND L.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND E.BNFT_LINE_CODED_VAL IS NOT NULL GROUP BY H.PRMRY_CD , E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID , E.BNFT_SYS_ID , K.BNFT_ID_NM , E.BNFT_LINE_CODED_VAL , E.BLVL_BNFT_QLFR_FRQNCY, E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC , T.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND , H.CD_DESC_TXT , C.BNFT_LVL_SQNC , D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID , M.PROD_SYS_ID , D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA ) LINES ORDER BY LINES.BENCOMPID, LINES.BNFTID , LINES.SEQNUM , LINES.linePva

SELECT LINES.LINEID, LINES.PRIMARYCODE REFERENCEID, LINES.BENCOMPID, LINES.BNFTID, LINES.BNFTVAL, LINES.LVLDESC, LINES.DATATYPELGND, LINES.REFDESC, LINES.PRODID, LINES.LINEPVA, LINES.BENEFITNAME, LINES.CONTRACTTIERSYSID,LINES.TIERCODE, LINES.FREQUENCYQUALIFIER FROM (SELECT H.PRMRY_CD PRIMARYCODE, E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID BENCOMPID, E.BNFT_SYS_ID BNFTID, E.BVAL_BNFT_VAL BNFTVAL, E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC LVLDESC, T.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND DATATYPELGND, H.CD_DESC_TXT REFDESC, C.BNFT_LVL_SQNC SEQNUM, D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID LINEID, E.PROD_SYS_ID PRODID, D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA LINEPVA, K.BNFT_ID_NM BENEFITNAME, E.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID CONTRACTTIERSYSID, L.TIER_CD TIERCODE, N.CRTRIA_VAL CRITERIAVALUE, E.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR FREQUENCYQUALIFIER, DECODE (L.TIER_CD,'AGE','AGY',L.TIER_CD) TIERORDER FROM BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN A, BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR B, BLVL_BNFT_LVL C, CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD E, DTYP_DATA_TYPE T, ITEM G, ITEM H, ITEM I, BLN_BNFT_LINE D, BMST_BNFT_MSTR K, TIER_DEFN L, CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR M, CNTRCT_TIER_CRTRIA_VAL N, TIER_CRTRIA P WHERE B.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = C.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_SYS_ID AND B.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID AND E.BNFT_SYS_ID = K.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND D.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = T.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID AND E.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND C.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR = G.PRMRY_CD(+) AND G.CTLG_ID(+) = 1935 -- QUALIFIER AND D.BNFT_LVL_EXTRNL_RFRNC_ID = H.PRMRY_CD(+) AND H.CTLG_ID(+) = 1938 -- REFERENCE AND D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA = I.PRMRY_CD AND I.CTLG_ID = 1936 -- PROVIDER ARRANGEMENT AND E.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND E.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND E.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND E.BVAL_BNFT_VAL IS NOT NULL AND E.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = M.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND E.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = M.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND M.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = L.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND M.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = N.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND N.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID = P.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID AND L.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = P.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND P.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR = 1 GROUP BY H.PRMRY_CD, E.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, E.BNFT_SYS_ID, K.BNFT_ID_NM, E.BVAL_BNFT_VAL, E.BLVL_BNFT_FRQNCY_QLFR, E.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, T.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND, H.CD_DESC_TXT, C.BNFT_LVL_SQNC, D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, E.PROD_SYS_ID, D.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA, E.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, L.TIER_CD, N.CRTRIA_VAL) LINES ORDER BY LINES.TIERORDER, --LINES.TIERCODE, LINES.BENCOMPID, LINES.BNFTID, LPAD(LINES.CRITERIAVALUE,10), LINES.CONTRACTTIERSYSID, LINES.SEQNUM, LINES.LINEPVA

SELECT adminoptions.questionnum, adminoptions.questiondesc, adminoptions.datatypelgnd, adminoptions.answer, adminoptions.refcode, adminoptions.adminoptprntid, adminoptions.bnftadmnid, adminoptions.bencompid, adminoptions.bnftid, adminoptions.adminlvlsysid, adminoptions.prodid, adminoptions.bencompseq, adminoptions.stdbenseq, adminoptions.pvdragmt, adminoptions.dsplyindctr, adminoptions.admoptnname, adminoptions.benefitName, adminoptions.qstnrid FROM (SELECT k.sqnc_nbr adminseqnum, e.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr questionnum, b.adqm_admn_qstn_desc questiondesc, d.dtyp_data_type_lgnd datatypelgnd, h.psbl_answr answer, e.rfrnc_id refcode, j.bnft_admin_sys_id bnftadmnid, g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id bencompid, g.bnft_sys_id bnftid, e.prnt_qstnr_hrchy_sys_id prntqstnrid, e.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id qstnrid, e.qstnr_dsply_sqnc_nbr seqnum, l.admin_opt_desc_txt adminname, l.admin_opt_sys_id adminoptprntid, k.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id adminlvlsysid, g.prod_sys_id prodid, m.sqnc_nbr bencompseq, n.sqnc_nbr stdbenseq, b.prvdr_arngmnt pvdragmt, a.qstrn_ssm_status dsplyindctr, l.admin_opt_desc_txt admoptnname, s.bnft_id_nm benefitName FROM cntrct_answr_ovrd a, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr b, dtyp_data_type d, qstnr_mstr e, (SELECT DISTINCT A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, B.prod_sys_id, A.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, A.bnft_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B WHERE A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND A.bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag = 'F' AND A.bnft_hide_flag = 'F') g, (SELECT DISTINCT A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id, B.prod_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B WHERE A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = B.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND A.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0}) p, psbl_answr h, bdm_bnft_defn_mstr i, bnft_admnstrn_assn j, bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn k, admin_opt_mstr l, prod_bnft_cmpnt_assn m, bnft_cmpnt_hrchy_assn n, bmst_bnft_mstr s WHERE g.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND g.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND e.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND b.dtyp_data_type_id = d.dtyp_data_type_id AND a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = k.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND h.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = e.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND h.psbl_answr_id = a.ovrd_answr_id --AND UPPER(h.psbl_answr) <> 'NOT ANSWERED' AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.bnft_sys_id = i.bnft_sys_id AND g.bnft_sys_id = s.bnft_sys_id AND a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = p.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND j.bnft_defn_sys_id = i.bnft_defn_sys_id AND k.bnft_admin_sys_id = j.bnft_admin_sys_id AND k.admin_opt_sys_id = l.admin_opt_sys_id AND a.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = e.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND p.prod_sys_id = m.prod_sys_id AND g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = m.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = n.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND g.bnft_sys_id = n.bnft_sys_id AND l.admin_opt_sys_id = e.admin_opt_sys_id AND h.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr) adminoptions ORDER BY adminoptions.bencompseq, adminoptions.stdbenseq, adminoptions.bnftadmnid, adminoptions.adminseqnum, adminoptions.seqnum

SELECT ADMINOPTIONS.QUESTIONNUM, ADMINOPTIONS.QUESTIONDESC, ADMINOPTIONS.DATATYPELGND, ADMINOPTIONS.ANSWER, ADMINOPTIONS.REFCODE, ADMINOPTIONS.ADMINOPTPRNTID, ADMINOPTIONS.BNFTADMNID, ADMINOPTIONS.BENCOMPID, ADMINOPTIONS.BNFTID, ADMINOPTIONS.ADMINLVLSYSID, ADMINOPTIONS.PRODID, ADMINOPTIONS.BENCOMPSEQ, ADMINOPTIONS.STDBENSEQ, ADMINOPTIONS.PVDRAGMT, ADMINOPTIONS.DSPLYINDCTR, ADMINOPTIONS.ADMOPTNNAME, ADMINOPTIONS.BENEFITNAME, ADMINOPTIONS.QSTNRID, ADMINOPTIONS.CONTRACTTIERID, ADMINOPTIONS.TIERCODE FROM (SELECT K.SQNC_NBR ADMINSEQNUM, E.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR QUESTIONNUM, B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC QUESTIONDESC, D.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_LGND DATATYPELGND, H.PSBL_ANSWR ANSWER, E.RFRNC_ID REFCODE, J.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID BNFTADMNID, G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID BENCOMPID, G.BNFT_SYS_ID BNFTID, E.PRNT_QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID PRNTQSTNRID, E.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID QSTNRID, E.QSTNR_DSPLY_SQNC_NBR SEQNUM, L.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT ADMINNAME, L.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID ADMINOPTPRNTID, K.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID ADMINLVLSYSID, G.PROD_SYS_ID PRODID, M.SQNC_NBR BENCOMPSEQ, N.SQNC_NBR STDBENSEQ, B.PRVDR_ARNGMNT PVDRAGMT, A.QSTNR_SSM_STATUS DSPLYINDCTR, L.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT ADMOPTNNAME, Q.BNFT_ID_NM BENEFITNAME, A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID CONTRACTTIERID, R.TIER_CD TIERCODE, T.CRTRIA_VAL CRITERIAVALUE, DECODE (R.TIER_CD,'AGE','AGY',R.TIER_CD) TIERORDER FROM CNTRCT_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD A, ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR B, DTYP_DATA_TYPE D, QSTNR_MSTR E, (SELECT DISTINCT DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, PROD_SYS_ID, BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, BNFT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F') G, (SELECT DISTINCT DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID, PROD_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0}) P, PSBL_ANSWR H, BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR I, BNFT_ADMNSTRN_ASSN J, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN K, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR L, PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN M, BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN N, BMST_BNFT_MSTR Q, TIER_DEFN R, CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR S, CNTRCT_TIER_CRTRIA_VAL T, TIER_CRTRIA U WHERE G.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND G.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND E.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND B.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID = D.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID AND A.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = K.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND H.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = E.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND H.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = A.OVRD_ANSWR_ID AND UPPER(H.PSBL_ANSWR) <> 'NOT ANSWERED' AND G.BNFT_SYS_ID = I.BNFT_SYS_ID AND G.BNFT_SYS_ID = Q.BNFT_SYS_ID AND A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = P.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND J.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = I.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND K.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID = J.BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID AND K.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = L.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND A.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = E.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND P.PROD_SYS_ID = M.PROD_SYS_ID AND G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = M.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = N.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND G.BNFT_SYS_ID = N.BNFT_SYS_ID AND L.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = E.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND H.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = S.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = S.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND S.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = R.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND S.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = T.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND T.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID = U.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID AND R.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = U.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND U.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR = 1) ADMINOPTIONS ORDER BY ADMINOPTIONS.TIERORDER, --ADMINOPTIONS.TIERCODE, ADMINOPTIONS.BENCOMPSEQ, ADMINOPTIONS.STDBENSEQ, ADMINOPTIONS.BNFTADMNID, LPAD(ADMINOPTIONS.CRITERIAVALUE,10), ADMINOPTIONS.CONTRACTTIERID, ADMINOPTIONS.ADMINSEQNUM, ADMINOPTIONS.SEQNUM
CALL CNTRCT_SSM_PROC({0},{1})

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR SET LST_CHG_USR = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = ?, CNTRCT_DLT_IND =? WHERE CNTRCT_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT RESERVE.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id,RESERVE.cntrct_id,RESERVE.cntrct_stts_cd,RESERVE.lst_chg_usr,RESERVE.lst_chg_tms,RESERVE.creatd_tm_stmp, RESERVE.creatd_usr_id ,B.DOMN_SYS_ID FROM (select A.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id,A.cntrct_id, A.cntrct_stts_cd, A.lst_chg_usr, A.lst_chg_tms, A.creatd_tm_stmp, A.creatd_usr_id from rsrvd_cntrct_pool A, (select count(A.DOMN_SYS_ID) numOfDomains,B.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id reserveCntrctId from ENTY_DOMN_INFO A,rsrvd_cntrct_pool B,( select distinct(A.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id) reservedId from rsrvd_cntrct_pool A,(select a.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id reserveId,b.DOMN_SYS_ID domainID from rsrvd_cntrct_pool a, ENTY_DOMN_INFO b, AVLBL_DOMN c where a.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id = b.ENTY_SYS_ID and c.DOMN_SYS_ID = b.DOMN_SYS_ID and b.ENTY_TYPE = 'reservecontract')AA where A.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id = AA.reserveId and AA.domainID {0} )AA where B.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id = AA.reservedId and A.ENTY_SYS_ID = AA.reservedId and A.ENTY_TYPE = 'reservecontract' group by B.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id)B where A.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id = B.reserveCntrctId and B.numOfDomains = {1} and cntrct_stts_cd = 'Y' and A.EFCTV_DT <= SYSDATE and A.EXPR_DT >= SYSDATE order by A.cntrct_id)RESERVE ,ENTY_DOMN_INFO B WHERE RESERVE.rsrvd_cntrct_sys_id = B.ENTY_SYS_ID AND ENTY_TYPE ='reservecontract'

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,b.DT_SGMNT_EFCTV_DT ,b.DT_SGMNT_EXPR_DT ,ROWNUM,c.PROD_NM from CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT b,PROD_MSTR c ,CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN d where d.CNTRCT_SYS_ID in (select a.CNTRCT_SYS_ID from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a where a.CNTRCT_ID = {0} and b.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = d.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and a. CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR in (select max(CNTRCT_VRSN_NBR) from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR a where a.CNTRCT_ID = {0} ) ) and b.PROD_SYS_ID=c.PROD_SYS_ID and b.DT_SGMNT_STTS_CD in ('CHECKED_OUT','BUILDING')

SELECT tier.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, tier.bnft_defn_sys_id,l.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id from (select distinct x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, x.bnft_defn_sys_id,x.bln_bnft_line_id,m.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID FROM cntrct_bnft_tier_custmzd x, cntrct_tier_mstr m WHERE x.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND x.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND x.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND x.bval_bnft_val IS NOT NULL AND m.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND m.bnft_sys_id = x.bnft_sys_id AND m.cntrct_tier_sys_id = x.cntrct_tier_sys_id AND m.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = x.dt_sgmnt_sys_id) tier,bln_bnft_line l WHERE tier.bln_bnft_line_id = l.bln_bnft_line_id AND tier.bnft_defn_sys_id = l.bnft_defn_sys_id GROUP BY tier.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, tier.bnft_defn_sys_id,l.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id,tier.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID HAVING COUNT (l.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id) > 1 UNION SELECT y.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, y.bnft_defn_sys_id,k.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES y,bln_bnft_line k, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN l WHERE y.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = l.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND y.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = l.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND y.BNFT_SYS_ID = l.BNFT_SYS_ID AND y.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND l.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND l.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND y.bln_bnft_line_id = k.bln_bnft_line_id AND y.bnft_defn_sys_id = k.bnft_defn_sys_id GROUP BY y.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, y.bnft_defn_sys_id,k.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id HAVING COUNT (k.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id) > 1

select ans_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id,c.bnft_defn_sys_id,d.rfrnc_id from cntrct_answr_ovrd ans_ovrd, psbl_answr ans ,bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn c, qstnr_mstr d, (SELECT UNIQUE bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, bnft_defn_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN WHERE dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag = 'F') e WHERE ans_ovrd.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND ans_ovrd.ovrd_answr_id = ans.psbl_answr_id --AND UPPER (ans.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED' AND ans_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = e.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND ans_ovrd.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = d.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND ans_ovrd.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.bnft_defn_sys_id = e.bnft_defn_sys_id AND c.admin_opt_sys_id = d.admin_opt_sys_id AND d.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = ans.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr HAVING COUNT (d.rfrnc_id) > 1 GROUP BY ans_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, c.bnft_defn_sys_id, d.rfrnc_id
union
select b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id,c.bnft_defn_sys_id,d.rfrnc_id from (select distinct ans_tier_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, ans_tier_ovrd.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, ans_tier_ovrd.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, ans.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, mstr.tier_defn_sys_id from cntrct_tier_answr_ovrd ans_tier_ovrd, psbl_answr ans, cntrct_tier_mstr mstr where ans_tier_ovrd.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} and ans_tier_ovrd.ovrd_answr_id = ans.psbl_answr_id --and UPPER (ans.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED' and mstr.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = ans_tier_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and mstr.cntrct_tier_sys_id = ans_tier_ovrd.cntrct_tier_sys_id)b, bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn c, qstnr_mstr d, (SELECT UNIQUE bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, bnft_defn_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN WHERE dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag = 'F') e WHERE b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = e.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = d.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.bnft_defn_sys_id = e.bnft_defn_sys_id AND c.admin_opt_sys_id = d.admin_opt_sys_id AND d.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr HAVING COUNT (d.rfrnc_id) > 1 GROUP BY b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, c.bnft_defn_sys_id, d.rfrnc_id,b.tier_defn_sys_id

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, d.bnft_cmpnt_nm, a.bnft_sys_id, e.bnft_id_nm, a.bln_bnft_line_id, a.blvl_bnft_lvl_id, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, b.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id, f.cd_desc_txt, b.bln_bnft_line_pva, a.tier_desc, dbms_random.random FROM (SELECT x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, x.bnft_sys_id, x.blvl_bnft_lvl_id, x.bln_bnft_line_id, x.bnft_defn_sys_id, td.tier_desc FROM cntrct_bnft_tier_custmzd x, cntrct_tier_mstr m, tier_defn td WHERE x.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND x.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND x.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND x.bval_bnft_val IS NOT NULL AND m.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND m.bnft_sys_id = x.bnft_sys_id AND m.cntrct_tier_sys_id = x.cntrct_tier_sys_id AND m.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = x.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND m.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = td.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID
UNION
SELECT Y.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID, Y.BNFT_SYS_ID, Y.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID, Y.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID, Y.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID, ' ' FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES Y, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN X WHERE Y.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = X.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND Y.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = X.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND Y.BNFT_SYS_ID = X.BNFT_SYS_ID AND Y.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND X.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND X.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' ) a, bln_bnft_line b, blvl_bnft_lvl c, bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr d, bmst_bnft_mstr e, item f, ( SELECT tier.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, tier.bnft_sys_id,bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id from (select distinct x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, x.bnft_sys_id,x.bnft_defn_sys_id,x.bln_bnft_line_id,m.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID FROM cntrct_bnft_tier_custmzd x, cntrct_tier_mstr m WHERE x.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND x.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND x.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND x.bval_bnft_val IS NOT NULL AND m.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND m.bnft_sys_id = x.bnft_sys_id AND m.cntrct_tier_sys_id = x.cntrct_tier_sys_id AND m.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = x.dt_sgmnt_sys_id) tier,bln_bnft_line l WHERE tier.bln_bnft_line_id = l.bln_bnft_line_id AND tier.bnft_defn_sys_id = l.bnft_defn_sys_id GROUP BY tier.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, tier.bnft_sys_id,l.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id,tier.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID HAVING COUNT (l.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id) > 1 UNION SELECT y.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, y.bnft_sys_id , k.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES y, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN z, bln_bnft_line k WHERE y.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = z.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND y.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = z.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND y.bnft_sys_id = z.bnft_sys_id AND y.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND z.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND z.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F'
AND y.bln_bnft_line_id = k.bln_bnft_line_id AND y.bnft_defn_sys_id = k.bnft_defn_sys_id GROUP BY y.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, y.bnft_sys_id , k.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id HAVING COUNT (k.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id) > 1) g
WHERE a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = d.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND a.bnft_sys_id = e.bnft_sys_id AND b.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id = f.prmry_cd AND f.ctlg_id = 1938 AND a.bln_bnft_line_id = b.bln_bnft_line_id AND a.bnft_defn_sys_id = b.bnft_defn_sys_id AND a.bnft_defn_sys_id = c.bnft_defn_sys_id AND a.blvl_bnft_lvl_id = c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id AND a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = g.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND a.bnft_sys_id = g.bnft_sys_id AND b.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id = g.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id ORDER BY d.bnft_cmpnt_nm, e.bnft_id_nm, b.bnft_lvl_extrnl_rfrnc_id, a.blvl_bnft_lvl_id, a.bln_bnft_line_id, a.tier_desc) WHERE ROWNUM <= {1}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT UNIQUE b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, b.bnft_cmpnt_nm, e.bnft_sys_id, e.bnft_id_nm, g.rfrnc_id, k.cd_desc_txt, h.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, f.admin_opt_sys_id, f.admin_opt_desc_txt, h.adqm_admn_qstn_desc, i.tier_desc, dbms_random.random FROM bcm_bnft_cmpnt_mstr b, bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn c, bdm_bnft_defn_mstr d, bmst_bnft_mstr e, admin_opt_mstr f, qstnr_mstr g, adqm_admn_qstn_mstr h, item k,
(select ans_tier_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, ans_tier_ovrd.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, ans_tier_ovrd.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, ans.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, mstr.tier_defn_sys_id, tier.tier_desc from cntrct_tier_answr_ovrd ans_tier_ovrd, psbl_answr ans, cntrct_tier_mstr mstr, tier_defn tier where ans_tier_ovrd.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} and ans_tier_ovrd.ovrd_answr_id = ans.psbl_answr_id -- and UPPER (ans.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED' and mstr.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = ans_tier_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and mstr.cntrct_tier_sys_id = ans_tier_ovrd.cntrct_tier_sys_id and tier.tier_defn_sys_id = mstr.tier_defn_sys_id
union
select ans_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, ans_ovrd.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, ans_ovrd.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, ans.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, -2, ' ' from cntrct_answr_ovrd ans_ovrd, psbl_answr ans where ans_ovrd.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} and ans_ovrd.ovrd_answr_id = ans.psbl_answr_id --and UPPER (ans.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED' ) i,
( select ans_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id,c.bnft_defn_sys_id,d.rfrnc_id from cntrct_answr_ovrd ans_ovrd, psbl_answr ans ,bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn c, qstnr_mstr d, (SELECT UNIQUE bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, bnft_defn_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN WHERE dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag = 'F') e WHERE ans_ovrd.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND ans_ovrd.ovrd_answr_id = ans.psbl_answr_id --AND UPPER (ans.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED' AND ans_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = e.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND ans_ovrd.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = d.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND ans_ovrd.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.bnft_defn_sys_id = e.bnft_defn_sys_id AND c.admin_opt_sys_id = d.admin_opt_sys_id AND d.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = ans.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr HAVING COUNT (d.rfrnc_id) > 1 GROUP BY ans_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, c.bnft_defn_sys_id, d.rfrnc_id
union
select b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id,c.bnft_defn_sys_id,d.rfrnc_id from (select distinct ans_tier_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, ans_tier_ovrd.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id, ans_tier_ovrd.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, ans.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr, mstr.tier_defn_sys_id from cntrct_tier_answr_ovrd ans_tier_ovrd, psbl_answr ans, cntrct_tier_mstr mstr where ans_tier_ovrd.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} and ans_tier_ovrd.ovrd_answr_id = ans.psbl_answr_id --and UPPER (ans.psbl_answr) != 'NOT ANSWERED' and mstr.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = ans_tier_ovrd.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and mstr.cntrct_tier_sys_id = ans_tier_ovrd.cntrct_tier_sys_id)b, bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn c, qstnr_mstr d, (SELECT UNIQUE bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, bnft_defn_sys_id FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN WHERE dt_sgmnt_sys_id = {0} AND bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND bnft_cmpnt_hide_flag = 'F') e WHERE b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = e.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND b.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = d.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id AND b.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.bnft_defn_sys_id = e.bnft_defn_sys_id AND c.admin_opt_sys_id = d.admin_opt_sys_id AND d.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = b.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr HAVING COUNT (d.rfrnc_id) > 1 GROUP BY b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, c.bnft_defn_sys_id, d.rfrnc_id,b.tier_defn_sys_id) x
WHERE i.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND i.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = c.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id AND c.bnft_defn_sys_id = d.bnft_defn_sys_id AND d.bnft_sys_id = e.bnft_sys_id AND c.admin_opt_sys_id = f.admin_opt_sys_id AND g.admin_opt_sys_id = f.admin_opt_sys_id AND g.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = h.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr AND x.rfrnc_id = g.rfrnc_id AND x.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND x.bnft_defn_sys_id = d.bnft_defn_sys_id AND g.rfrnc_id = k.prmry_cd AND k.ctlg_id = 1938 AND i.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id = g.qstnr_hrchy_sys_id ORDER BY b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id, e.bnft_sys_id, g.rfrnc_id, f.admin_opt_sys_id) WHERE ROWNUM <= {1}

SELECT A.NOTE_ID FROM NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL A, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN G,QSTNR_MSTR QSTNR,BNFT_ADMiN_TO_LVL_ASSN BNFTAOPT WHERE A.PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID IN ( SELECT A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT A, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN B WHERE A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND B.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = {0} ) AND A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID = G.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND A.SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHQUESTION' AND G.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and BNFTAOPT.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND QSTNR.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND (QSTNR.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID) NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID and A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID = ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ) AND BNFTAOPT.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AND BNFTAOPT.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID=QSTNR.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID

SELECT DISTINCT a.note_id FROM note_domain_ovrd_val a, NMST_NOTE_MSTR g , CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN h , PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD i , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT j WHERE a.prmry_enty_type ='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND a.prmry_enty_id IN (SELECT a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id FROM cntrct_dt_sgmnt a, cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn b WHERE a.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND b.cntrct_sys_id = {0} AND (a.dt_sgmnt_stts_cd = 'BUILDING' OR a.dt_sgmnt_stts_cd = 'CHECKED_OUT') ) AND h.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.prmry_enty_id AND h.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND a.scndry_enty_type ='ATTACHBNFTLINE' AND a.NOTE_ID = g.NOTE_ID AND a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = g.NOTE_VRSN_NBR AND j.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = h.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND i.prod_sys_id = j.prod_sys_id AND i.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = h.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND i.bnft_sys_id = h.bnft_sys_id AND i.bln_bnft_line_id = a.scndry_enty_id AND i.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND i.bnft_line_hide_flag = 'F' AND i.bnft_lvl_hide_flag = 'F' AND h.bnft_hide_flag = 'F' AND a.NOTE_OVRD_STTS = 'F' AND a.scndry_enty_id NOT IN (SELECT BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES z WHERE z.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.prmry_enty_id )

SELECT A.NOTE_ID FROM NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL A, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN G,QSTNR_MSTR QSTNR,BNFT_ADMiN_TO_LVL_ASSN BNFTAOPT WHERE A.PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID IN ( SELECT A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT A, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT_ASSN B WHERE A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND B.CNTRCT_SYS_ID = {0} ) AND A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID = G.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND A.SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHQUESTION' AND G.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and BNFTAOPT.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND QSTNR.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND (QSTNR.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID) NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID and A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID = ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ) AND BNFTAOPT.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AND BNFTAOPT.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID=QSTNR.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID

SELECT temp.note_id , temp.NOTE_VRSN_NBR , temp.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA , temp.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC, temp.BNFT_ID_NM , temp.BNFT_CMPNT_NM , temp.NOTE_NM , temp.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT a.note_id, a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR , c.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA , d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_DESC , E.BNFT_ID_NM , f.BNFT_CMPNT_NM , g.NOTE_NM , c.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID , p.SQNC_NBR , q.SQNC_NBR , d.BNFT_LVL_SQNC FROM note_domain_ovrd_val a, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN b , BLN_BNFT_LINE c , BLVL_BNFT_LVL d , BMST_BNFT_MSTR e , BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR f , NMST_NOTE_MSTR g , PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN p , BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN q , CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT r , PROD_BNFT_CSTMZD s WHERE a.prmry_enty_type ='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND a.prmry_enty_id = {0} AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.prmry_enty_id AND b.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id = a.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id AND a.scndry_enty_id = s.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND a.scndry_enty_type ='ATTACHBNFTLINE' AND r.PROD_SYS_ID = s.PROD_SYS_ID AND b.BNFT_SYS_ID = s.BNFT_SYS_ID AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = s.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND s.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = c.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND s.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND c.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = d.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND b.BNFT_SYS_ID = e.BNFT_SYS_ID AND b.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = f.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND a.NOTE_ID = g.NOTE_ID AND a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = g.NOTE_VRSN_NBR AND b.bnft_hide_flag ='F' AND a.NOTE_OVRD_STTS ='F' AND s.bnft_hide_flag ='F' AND s.bnft_line_hide_flag ='F' AND s.bnft_lvl_hide_flag ='F' AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = r.dt_sgmnt_sys_id AND p.PROD_SYS_ID = r.PROD_SYS_ID AND p.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =f.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND q.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =f.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND q.BNFT_SYS_ID =e.BNFT_SYS_ID AND a.scndry_enty_id NOT IN (SELECT BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES z WHERE z.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.prmry_enty_id ) ORDER BY p.SQNC_NBR, q.SQNC_NBR , d.BNFT_LVL_SQNC )temp WHERE ROWNUM <= {1}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.NOTE_ID,A.NOTE_VRSN_NBR, ADQM.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC, BMST.BNFT_ID_NM, AOP.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT, BCM.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, NMST.NOTE_NM, A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR, BNFTAOP.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID FROM NOTE_DOMAIN_OVRD_VAL A, CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN G,ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR ADQM,BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR BDM,BMST_BNFT_MSTR BMST, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN BNFTAOP, ADMIN_OPT_MSTR AOP, BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR BCM,NMST_NOTE_MSTR NMST, QSTNR_MSTR QSTNR, CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT DTSG, PROD_BNFT_CMPNT_ASSN PROD_BC,BNFT_CMPNT_HRCHY_ASSN BHRCY WHERE A.PRMRY_ENTY_TYPE='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID = G.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = G.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND A.SCNDRY_ENTY_TYPE ='ATTACHQUESTION' AND G.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND QSTNR.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND (A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID, QSTNR.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID) NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID,QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID=A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID=A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AND AOP.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = BNFTAOP.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID ) AND ADQM.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND BDM.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND BDM.BNFT_SYS_ID = BMST.BNFT_SYS_ID AND BNFTAOP.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND BNFTAOP.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = A.SCNDRY_ENTY_ID AND AOP.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = BNFTAOP.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND BCM.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND NMST.NOTE_ID=A.NOTE_ID AND NMST.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = A.NOTE_VRSN_NBR AND A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID = DTSG.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND DTSG.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND DTSG.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.PRMRY_ENTY_ID AND PROD_BC.PROD_SYS_ID = DTSG.PROD_SYS_ID AND PROD_BC.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND BHRCY.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = PROD_BC.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND BHRCY.BNFT_SYS_ID = BMST.BNFT_SYS_ID AND QSTNR.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = BNFTAOP.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID ORDER BY PROD_BC.SQNC_NBR, BHRCY.SQNC_NBR, BNFTAOP.SQNC_NBR, QSTNR.SQNC_NBR ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND {1}

SELECT a.note_id ,a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR,f.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT,g.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC,g.NOTE_NM,a.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR,f.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID FROM note_domain_ovrd_val a, CNTRCT_ADMIN_QSTN_ANSWR_OVRD B, QSTNR_MSTR C, PSBL_ANSWR E , ADMIN_OPT_MSTR F, ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR G, NMST_NOTE_MSTR g, enty_admn_opt_assn p WHERE a.prmry_enty_type='ATTACHCONTRACT' AND a.prmry_enty_id = {0} AND b.dt_sgmnt_sys_id = a.prmry_enty_id AND a.scndry_enty_id = b.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND a.scndry_enty_type ='ATTACHADMNQUEST' AND b.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID = c.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID AND a.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR =c.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND e.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = c.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND upper(e.psbl_answr) = upper('Not Answered') AND b.OVRD_ANSWR_ID = e.PSBL_ANSWR_ID AND f.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID =b.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID AND g.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR =c.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND a.NOTE_ID = g.NOTE_ID AND a.NOTE_VRSN_NBR = g.NOTE_VRSN_NBR AND p.admn_opt_sys_id = b.admin_opt_sys_id AND p.enty_sys_id = {0} AND p.enty_type = 'CONTRACT' AND ROWNUM <= {1} ORDER BY p.SQNC_NBR,c.SQNC_NBR
CALL DELETE_UNCODED_NOTES ({0},{1})

SELECT A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, A.TIER_DESC, A.TIER_CD, CASE WHEN a.CRTRIA_NM {1} THEN E.crtria_val_desc ELSE a.CRTRIA_NM END AS CRTRIA_NM, A.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID,A.CRTRIA_VAL, A.RFRNC_ID, A.TIER_FRMT, A.TIER_CRTRIA_IND FROM (SELECT A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, C.TIER_DESC, C.TIER_CD, D.CRTRIA_NM, B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID,B.CRTRIA_VAL,D.RFRNC_ID, C.TIER_FRMT, D.TIER_CRTRIA_IND, D.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR FROM CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR A,CNTRCT_TIER_CRTRIA_VAL B,TIER_DEFN C,TIER_CRTRIA D WHERE DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = B.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID AND A.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = C.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND C.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = D.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID AND B.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID = D.TIER_CRTRIA_SYS_ID ) a, TIER_CRTRIA_PSBL_VAL E where a.tier_crtria_sys_id= e.tier_crtria_sys_id(+) And a.crtria_val =e.psbl_val(+)
oRDER BY A.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID, a.DSPLY_SQNC_NBR

SelectSQLQuery.name: retrieveRootDeleteContracts
SelectSQLQuery.STATIC: SELECT DISTINCT CNTRCT_ID, MAX(CNTRCT_SYS_ID) FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR A, (SELECT DISTINCT ENTITY_ID contractId FROM CNTRCT_TRANS_LOG WHERE ENTITY_STTS_CD IN('OBJECT_TRANSFERRED', 'PUBLISHED')) B WHERE A.CNTRCT_ID NOT IN ( SELECT CNTRCT_ID FROM CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR WHERE CNTRCT_STTS_CD != 'MARKED_FOR_DELETION') AND A. CNTRCT_ID = B.contractId
GROUP BY CNTRCT_ID

DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT CS.CNTRCT_ID CNTRCT_ID, CS.STATUS STATUS, CS.STATUS_DATE STATUS_DATE, CS.REASON_CODE REASON_CODE, CS.CREATD_USER_ID CREATD_USER_ID, CS.CREATD_TM_STMP CREATD_TM_STMP, CS.LST_CHG_USR LST_CHG_USR, CS.LST_CHG_TMS LST_CHG_TMS, (SELECT I.CD_DESC_TXT FROM CATALOG C, ITEM I WHERE C.CTLG_NAME = 'REASON CODES' AND I.CTLG_ID = C.CTLG_ID AND TRIM(CS.REASON_CODE) = I.PRMRY_CD) REASON_DESCRIPTION, CS.TERMED_CNTRCT_ID TERMED_CNTRCT_ID FROM CNTRCT_STATUS CS WHERE CS.CNTRCT_ID = ?

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE CNTRCT_STATUS SET STATUS = ?, STATUS_DATE = ?, REASON_CODE = ?, LST_CHG_USR = ?, LST_CHG_TMS = SYSDATE, TERMED_CNTRCT_ID = ? WHERE CNTRCT_ID = ?
INSERT INTO CNTRCT_STATUS(CNTRCT_ID,STATUS,STATUS_DATE,REASON_CODE,CREATD_USER_ID,CREATD_TM_STMP,LST_CHG_USR,LST_CHG_TMS, TERMED_CNTRCT_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,SYSDATE,?,SYSDATE,?)
DELETE FROM CNTRCT_STATUS WHERE CNTRCT_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: SELECT G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR,A.BNFT_SYS_ID,A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, L.BNFT_ID_NM,M.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, F.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT , G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A INNER JOIN CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B ON (A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM C ON(B.PROD_SYS_ID = C.PROD_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN D ON(D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = C.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR E ON (A.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN ADMIN_OPT_MSTR F ON(D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN QSTNR_MSTR H ON (H.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR G ON (G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = H.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR ) INNER JOIN QSTN_DOMN_ASSN I ON(G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = I.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND I.DOMN_CD = 'C-ACCUM') INNER JOIN ITEM J ON(I.DOMN_CD = J.PRMRY_CD) INNER JOIN CATALOG K ON(K.CTLG_ID = J.CTLG_ID AND UPPER(K.CTLG_NAME) = UPPER('FUNCTIONAL DOMAIN')) INNER JOIN BMST_BNFT_MSTR L ON L.BNFT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_SYS_ID INNER JOIN BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR M ON M.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID INNER JOIN BNFT_ACCUMR_ASSN N ON N.BNFT_SYS_ID = L.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID AND G.ADQM_QSTN_MSTR_PARNT_SYS_ID = N.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR WHERE B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={0} AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND E.BNFT_SYS_ID = {2} AND C.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG='F' AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG='F' AND A.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F'

SELECT DISTINCT G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR,A.BNFT_SYS_ID,A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID,A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID,F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, L.BNFT_ID_NM,M.BNFT_CMPNT_NM, F.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT , G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A INNER JOIN CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B ON (A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM C ON(B.PROD_SYS_ID = C.PROD_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN D ON(D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = C.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR E ON (A.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN ADMIN_OPT_MSTR F ON(D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN QSTNR_MSTR H ON (H.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR G ON (G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = H.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR ) INNER JOIN QSTN_DOMN_ASSN I ON(G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = I.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND I.DOMN_CD = 'C-ACCUM') INNER JOIN ITEM J ON(I.DOMN_CD = J.PRMRY_CD) INNER JOIN CATALOG K ON(K.CTLG_ID = J.CTLG_ID AND UPPER(K.CTLG_NAME) = UPPER('FUNCTIONAL DOMAIN')) INNER JOIN BMST_BNFT_MSTR L ON L.BNFT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_SYS_ID INNER JOIN BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR M ON M.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID INNER JOIN BNFT_ACCUMR_ASSN N ON N.BNFT_SYS_ID = L.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID AND G.ADQM_QSTN_MSTR_PARNT_SYS_ID = N.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr INNER JOIN BLN_BNFT_LINE P ON (G.PRVDR_ARNGMNT = P.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA AND P.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID IN (SELECT CAST(COLUMN_VALUE AS NUMBER) FROM TABLE(CAST(STR2TBL(G.BNFT_LINE_DATA_TYPE_ID) AS NT_VARCHAR2)))) INNER JOIN BLVL_BNFT_LVL Q ON P.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = Q.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND G.QSTN_TERM = Q.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM --(checkContains(G.QSTN_TERM,Q.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM) >0) AND (checkContains(G.QSTN_QLFR,Q.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR) >0) AND P.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = Q.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID INNER JOIN CNTRCT_BNFT_CODED_LINES R ON A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = R.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND R.BNFT_SYS_ID=A.BNFT_SYS_ID AND R.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND (R.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = P.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND R.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = P.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID) WHERE B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID ={0} AND C.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG='F' AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG='F' AND A.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F'

SELECT D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A INNER JOIN CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B ON (A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM C ON(B.PROD_SYS_ID = C.PROD_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN D ON(D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = C.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR E ON (A.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN ADMIN_OPT_MSTR F ON(D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD L ON L.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND L.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND L.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID WHERE B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = {2} AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID = {3} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' AND A.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F'

SELECT D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, M.PSBL_ANSWR , M.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A INNER JOIN CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B ON (A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM C ON(B.PROD_SYS_ID = C.PROD_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN D ON(D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = C.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR E ON (A.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN ADMIN_OPT_MSTR F ON(D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD L ON L.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID INNER JOIN PSBL_ANSWR M ON M.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = L.OVRD_ANSWR_ID INNER JOIN BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR N ON N.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND L.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND L.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID WHERE B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND F.ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID = (SELECT ADMN_OPT_PARNT_SYS_ID FROM ADMIN_OPT_MSTR WHERE ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID={1}) AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND A.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND M.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = {2} AND N.BNFT_CMPNT_NM = 'GENERAL BENEFITS'

SELECT C.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR,A.ACCUMR_CD FROM BNFT_ACCUMR_ASSN A, BMST_BNFT_MSTR B, ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR C WHERE A.BNFT_SYS_ID = B.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID AND a.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr = c.adqm_qstn_mstr_parnt_sys_id AND B.BNFT_SYS_ID = {0} AND C.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = {1}

SELECT A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR, E.ACCUMR_CD FROM QSTNR_MSTR A INNER JOIN QSTN_DOMN_ASSN B ON(A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND B.DOMN_CD = 'C-ACCUM') INNER JOIN ITEM C ON(B.DOMN_CD = C.PRMRY_CD) INNER JOIN CATALOG D ON(D.CTLG_ID = C.CTLG_ID AND UPPER(D.CTLG_NAME) = UPPER('FUNCTIONAL DOMAIN')) INNER JOIN BNFT_ACCUMR_ASSN E ON (A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = E.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR) INNER JOIN BMST_BNFT_MSTR F ON (E.BNFT_SYS_ID = F.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID) WHERE A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = {0} AND F.BNFT_SYS_ID = {1}

SELECT D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, M.PSBL_ANSWR , M.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A INNER JOIN CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B ON (A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM C ON(B.PROD_SYS_ID = C.PROD_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN D ON(D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = C.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR E ON (A.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN ADMIN_OPT_MSTR F ON(D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN CNTRCT_ANSWR_OVRD L ON L.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID INNER JOIN PSBL_ANSWR M ON M.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = L.OVRD_ANSWR_ID AND L.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND L.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID WHERE B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = {2} AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID = {3} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND A.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND M.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = {4}

select distinct bbcm.BNFT_CMPNT_NM,bbm.BNFT_ID_NM,adqm.adqm_admn_qstn_desc,dbms_random.random from cntrct_answr_ovrd cao,CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR ccm,cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn cdsa,qstnr_mstr qm,adqm_admn_qstn_mstr adqm, bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn bnla,cntrct_bnft_assn cba,cntrct_dt_sgmnt cds,BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR bbcm,bmst_bnft_mstr bbm, bnft_cmpnt_hrchy_assn bcha,psbl_answr pa where ccm.cntrct_sys_id=cdsa.cntrct_sys_id and qm.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr=adqm.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr and cao.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID=qm.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID and cao.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID=bnla.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and cao.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID=cba.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and cao.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID=cba.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and bnla.bnft_admin_sys_id=cba.bnft_admin_sys_id and cba.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and cba.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and adqm.adqm_admn_qstn_desc={0} and ccm.cntrct_vrsn_nbr= (select max(cntrct_vrsn_nbr) from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR where cntrct_id =ccm.cntrct_id) and qm.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID=bnla.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID and cao.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and bnla.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID=cba.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cba.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cao.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and bbcm.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = cba.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and bbm.bnft_sys_id = bcha.bnft_sys_id and bcha.bnft_sys_id=cba.bnft_sys_id and bcha.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id=cba.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and cao.ovrd_answr_id =pa.psbl_answr_id and pa.psbl_answr='Y' and cba.bnft_hide_flag='F' and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id={1} and bbm.BNFT_ID_NM={2}
SELECT cd_desc_txt,dbms_random.random FROM item where ctlg_id={0} and scndry_cd={1}

select distinct bbcm.BNFT_CMPNT_NM,bbm.BNFT_ID_NM,adqm.adqm_admn_qstn_desc,dbms_random.random from cntrct_answr_ovrd cao,CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR ccm,cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn cdsa,qstnr_mstr qm,adqm_admn_qstn_mstr adqm, bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn bnla,cntrct_bnft_assn cba,cntrct_dt_sgmnt cds,BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR bbcm,bmst_bnft_mstr bbm, bnft_cmpnt_hrchy_assn bcha where ccm.cntrct_sys_id=cdsa.cntrct_sys_id and qm.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr=adqm.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr and cao.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID=qm.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID and cao.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID=bnla.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and cao.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID=cba.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and cao.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID=cba.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and bnla.bnft_admin_sys_id=cba.bnft_admin_sys_id and cba.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and cba.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and adqm.adqm_admn_qstn_desc={0} and ccm.cntrct_vrsn_nbr= (select max(cntrct_vrsn_nbr) from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR where cntrct_id =ccm.cntrct_id) and qm.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID=bnla.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID and cao.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and bnla.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID=cba.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cba.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cao.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and bbcm.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = cba.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and bbm.bnft_sys_id = bcha.bnft_sys_id and bcha.bnft_sys_id=cba.bnft_sys_id and bcha.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id=cba.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id={1} and bbcm.BNFT_CMPNT_NM= {2} and bbm.BNFT_ID_NM={3}

select distinct bbcm.BNFT_CMPNT_NM,bbm.BNFT_ID_NM,adqm.adqm_admn_qstn_desc,dbms_random.random from cntrct_tier_answr_ovrd ctao,CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR ccm,cntrct_dt_sgmnt_assn cdsa,qstnr_mstr qm,adqm_admn_qstn_mstr adqm, bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn bnla,cntrct_bnft_assn cba,cntrct_dt_sgmnt cds,BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR bbcm,bmst_bnft_mstr bbm, bnft_cmpnt_hrchy_assn bcha where ccm.cntrct_sys_id=cdsa.cntrct_sys_id and qm.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr=adqm.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr and ctao.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID=qm.QSTNR_HRCHY_SYS_ID and ctao.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID=bnla.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and ctao.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID=cba.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and ctao.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID=cba.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID and bnla.bnft_admin_sys_id=cba.bnft_admin_sys_id and cba.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and cba.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and adqm.adqm_admn_qstn_desc={0} and ccm.cntrct_vrsn_nbr= (select max(cntrct_vrsn_nbr) from CMST_CNTRCT_MSTR where cntrct_id =ccm.cntrct_id) and qm.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID=bnla.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID and ctao.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and bnla.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID=cba.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cba.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=ctao.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id=cdsa.dt_sgmnt_sys_id and bbcm.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = cba.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID and bbm.bnft_sys_id = bcha.bnft_sys_id and bcha.bnft_sys_id=cba.bnft_sys_id and bcha.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id=cba.bnft_cmpnt_sys_id and cds.dt_sgmnt_sys_id={1} and bbcm.BNFT_CMPNT_NM= {2} and bbm.BNFT_ID_NM={3}

SELECT A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR FROM ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR A INNER JOIN QSTN_DOMN_ASSN B ON(A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = B.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND B.DOMN_CD = 'C-ACCUM') INNER JOIN ITEM C ON(B.DOMN_CD = C.PRMRY_CD) INNER JOIN CATALOG D ON(D.CTLG_ID = C.CTLG_ID AND UPPER(D.CTLG_NAME) = UPPER('FUNCTIONAL DOMAIN')) WHERE A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = {0}

SELECT DISTINCT G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR, A.BNFT_SYS_ID , A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID , A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID , F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID , L.BNFT_ID_NM , M.BNFT_CMPNT_NM , F.ADMIN_OPT_DESC_TXT , G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_DESC , R.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID , T.TIER_DESC , U.CRTRIA_NM FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A INNER JOIN CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B ON (A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM C ON(B.PROD_SYS_ID = C.PROD_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN D ON(D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = C.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR E ON (A.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN ADMIN_OPT_MSTR F ON(D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN QSTNR_MSTR H ON (H.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_MSTR G ON (G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = H.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR ) INNER JOIN QSTN_DOMN_ASSN I ON(G.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = I.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR AND I.DOMN_CD = 'C-ACCUM') INNER JOIN ITEM J ON(I.DOMN_CD = J.PRMRY_CD) INNER JOIN CATALOG K ON(K.CTLG_ID = J.CTLG_ID) AND UPPER(K.CTLG_NAME) = UPPER('FUNCTIONAL DOMAIN') INNER JOIN BMST_BNFT_MSTR L ON L.BNFT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_SYS_ID INNER JOIN BCM_BNFT_CMPNT_MSTR M ON M.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID INNER JOIN BNFT_ACCUMR_ASSN N ON N.BNFT_SYS_ID = L.BNFT_PARNT_SYS_ID AND G.ADQM_QSTN_MSTR_PARNT_SYS_ID = N.adqm_admn_qstn_nbr INNER JOIN BLN_BNFT_LINE P ON (G.PRVDR_ARNGMNT = P.BLN_BNFT_LINE_PVA AND P.DTYP_DATA_TYPE_ID IN (SELECT CAST(COLUMN_VALUE AS NUMBER) FROM TABLE(CAST(STR2TBL(G.BNFT_LINE_DATA_TYPE_ID) AS NT_VARCHAR2)) )) INNER JOIN BLVL_BNFT_LVL Q ON P.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = Q.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND G.QSTN_TERM = Q.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM --(checkContains(G.QSTN_TERM,Q.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_TERM) >0) AND (checkContains(G.QSTN_QLFR,Q.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_QLFR) >0) AND P.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = Q.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID INNER JOIN CNTRCT_BNFT_TIER_CUSTMZD R ON (A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = R.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND R.BNFT_SYS_ID =A.BNFT_SYS_ID AND R.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID =A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID AND R.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = P.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID AND R.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID = P.BLN_BNFT_LINE_ID AND R.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = P.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID AND R.BVAL_BNFT_VAL IS NOT NULL) INNER JOIN CNTRCT_TIER_MSTR S ON R.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = S.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID INNER JOIN TIER_DEFN T ON S.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = T.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID INNER JOIN TIER_CRTRIA U ON U.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID = T.TIER_DEFN_SYS_ID WHERE B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND C.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG='F' AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND A.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG = 'F'

SELECT D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, M.PSBL_ANSWR , M.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR FROM CNTRCT_BNFT_ASSN A INNER JOIN CNTRCT_DT_SGMNT B ON (A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM C ON(B.PROD_SYS_ID = C.PROD_SYS_ID AND C.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN D ON(D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = C.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN BDM_BNFT_DEFN_MSTR E ON (A.BNFT_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_SYS_ID AND D.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = E.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN ADMIN_OPT_MSTR F ON(D.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN CNTRCT_TIER_ANSWR_OVRD L ON (L.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = A.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID AND L.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = D.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID AND L.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID) INNER JOIN PSBL_ANSWR M ON (M.PSBL_ANSWR_ID = L.OVRD_ANSWR_ID) WHERE B.DT_SGMNT_SYS_ID = {0} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} AND F.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = {2} AND A.BNFT_SYS_ID = {3} AND A.BNFT_CMPNT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND A.BNFT_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND C.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG ='F' AND L.CNTRCT_TIER_SYS_ID = {4} AND M.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = {5}
